SELECT BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.BG_YOSAN_EXCEL_ID, BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.YOSAN_HEAD_ID, BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.MS_VESSEL_ID, BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.SHUBETSU, BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.FILE_NAME, BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.FILE_DATA, BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.RENEW_DATE, BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.RENEW_USER_ID, BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.TS,
MS_USER.SEI || ' ' || MS_USER.MEI as RENEW_USER_NAME
FROM BG_YOSAN_EXCEL
LEFT JOIN MS_USER ON MS_USER.MS_USER_ID = BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.RENEW_USER_ID
WHERE BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.YOSAN_HEAD_ID = :YOSAN_HEAD_ID AND BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.SHUBETSU = :SHUBETSU

INSERT INTO BG_YOSAN_EXCEL ( BG_YOSAN_EXCEL_ID, YOSAN_HEAD_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID, SHUBETSU, FILE_NAME, FILE_DATA, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES ( nextval('SEQ_BG_YOSAN_EXCEL_ID'), :YOSAN_HEAD_ID, :MS_VESSEL_ID, :SHUBETSU, :FILE_NAME, :FILE_DATA, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE BG_YOSAN_EXCEL SET
YOSAN_HEAD_ID = :YOSAN_HEAD_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID, SHUBETSU = :SHUBETSU, FILE_NAME = :FILE_NAME, FILE_DATA = :FILE_DATA, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (BG_YOSAN_EXCEL_ID = :BG_YOSAN_EXCEL_ID) AND (TS = :TS)

INSERT INTO BG_YOSAN_EXCEL ( BG_YOSAN_EXCEL_ID, YOSAN_HEAD_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID, SHUBETSU, FILE_NAME, FILE_DATA, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID )
SELECT nextval('SEQ_BG_YOSAN_EXCEL_ID'), :YOSAN_HEAD_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID, SHUBETSU, FILE_NAME, FILE_DATA, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID
FROM BG_YOSAN_EXCEL
JOIN BG_YOSAN_HEAD ON BG_YOSAN_HEAD.YOSAN_HEAD_ID = BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.YOSAN_HEAD_ID
WHERE BG_YOSAN_HEAD.YOSAN_HEAD_ID = :LAST_YOSAN_HEAD_ID AND BG_YOSAN_EXCEL.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID
